author: TNW Deals
title: Social distancing doesn’t have to seal off your world. Here’s how to open it back up.
description: It’s called The Social Distancing Lifetime Subscription Bundle ft. Rosetta Stone ($179.10, 76 percent off from TNW Deals) with promo code: SOCIALDISTANCE10, but it's really just a tool collection to take better advantage of everything around you once stay-at-…
content:
TLDR: With The Social Distancing Lifetime Subscription Bundle Ft. Rosetta Stone, you can learn a new language, read dozens of books and have full online protection for under $200.
